newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - Australia growth, price outlook favourable - RBA.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - Australia growth, price outlook favourable - RBA.

text.p: The outlook is favourable for economic growth and inflation in Australia in 1996/97, the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) said in its annual report.
The central bank said it expected good growth in business investment, a recovery in the housing market during 1996/97, and a further expansion in household spending.
"On balance, these factors should help to deliver a growth rate sufficient to make modest inroads into the current unacceptably high level of unemployment," the RBA said.
"The immediate outlook for inflation is favourable," the bank said.
